lead_paragraph: Chris Froome says he would work for British team mate Geraint Thomas at this year's Olympic Games if his own gold medal ambitions falter in Rio.

headline.print_headline: Froome Prepared to Help Thomas Win Gold in Rio
headline.main: Froome Prepared to Help Thomas Win Gold in Rio

snippet: Chris Froome says he would work for British team mate Geraint Thomas at this year's Olympic Games if his own gold medal ambitions falter in Rio....
